title: "Facebook confident it can be ‘cool’ again"
excerpt: "Facebook is facing an uphill battle to be cool again, according to Metas vice president of Facebook Tom Alison, who is optimistic that a combination of new AI tools and more short-form video content dubbed Reels will help the tech giant ultimately win the battle for eyeballs against the likes of Chinese giant TikTok."
